desc.cn: Furyctl 是 Kubernetes Fury 发行版的命令行伴侣，用于管理 Kubernetes Fury 集群的整个生命周期
desc.en: furyctl is the command line companion for the Kubernetes Fury Distribution to manage the full lifecycle of your Kubernetes Fury clusters

/curl.cmd:
curl -L "https://github.com/sighupio/furyctl/releases/latest/download/furyctl-$(uname -s)-amd64.tar.gz" -o /tmp/furyctl.tar.gz && tar xfz /tmp/furyctl.tar.gz -C /tmp \
&& chmod +x /tmp/furyctl \
&& sudo mv /tmp/furyctl /usr/local/bin/furyctl
